---

## Type of Change

Select all that apply:

- [ ] Feat — New feature (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Fix — Bug fix (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Docs — Documentation update
- [ ] Refactor — Code refactoring (no API changes)
- [ ] Perf — Performance improvement
- [ ] Test — Adding or correcting tests
- [ ] Chore — Tooling, configuration, dependency updates
- [ ] BREAKING CHANGE — Existing functionality changes

---

## The "Vero Core Law" Checklist (Mandatory)

If your PR violates these principles, it will be rejected.

- [ ] Zero Dependencies — I did NOT add runtime dependencies to the Core
- [ ] Web Standards First — I used universal APIs (globalThis, console)
- [ ] Composition over Inheritance — I respected the console wrapping
      architecture

---

## Quality Assurance

- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] JSDoc added to public interfaces/functions
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
- [ ] No new lint warnings
- [ ] Tests added (if applicable)
- [ ] All tests pass locally

- [ ] Branch name follows: type/short-description
- [ ] Commits follow Conventional Commits specification
